text:
I have been using mod_ldap and mod_auth_ldap with apache 2.0.44 for some time, 
compiled with the openldap 2.0.27 SDK. The ldap servers are all running slapd 
1.2.12. With this combination everything runs OK.

I compiled a apache 2.0.47, using the same configuration, and when trying to 
use mod_auth_ldap the server complains about "unsupported protocol version 3".

Is there some undocumented way to force the ldap protocol spoken by mod_ldap?
creator: apache@padilla.net
apache@padilla.net
minfrin@sharp.fm
text:
LDAP v2.0 servers are ancient at this stage, and the v1.2.12 v of openldap is
also long obsolete. It's doubtful that support for v2.0 servers will be offered
at this point.
